info.name: OEMS APIs Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for OEMS - Ride Booking Platform with Multi-Admin System

Base URL: http://localhost:8080

This collection includes:
üîê Authentication APIs (5 endpoints)
üöó Ride Management APIs (4 endpoints)
üöô Driver APIs (17 endpoints)
üè¢ Showroom Admin APIs (11 endpoints)
üëë Super Admin APIs (15 endpoints)
üîß Driver Admin APIs (10 endpoints)
üí≥ Payment APIs (1 endpoint)
üè† Public/Utility APIs (4 endpoints)

Total: 67+ endpoints

Environment Variables Required:
- base_url: http://localhost:8080
- phone: +1234567890
- otp_code: (dynamic)
- trip_id: (dynamic)
- user_id: (dynamic)
- driver_jwt_token: (dynamic)
- showroom_admin_jwt: (dynamic)
- super_admin_jwt: (dynamic)
- driver_admin_jwt: (dynamic)
- customer_jwt_token: (dynamic)
- driver_id: (dynamic)
- showroom_id: (dynamic)
- ride_id: (dynamic)
